channel.title: "uwt wrapper ERROR: /usr/bin/ssh.whonix-orig does not exist"in Whonix 8
channel.description:
I installed Whonix 8 but connecting to a remote host from Whonix workstation using ssh fails:
[tt]user@host:~$ ssh user@myhost.com uwtwrapper uwt wrapper ERROR: /usr/bin/ssh.whonix-orig does not exist.[/tt]
I couldn't find any help for this in docs or forums.

item.title: "uwt wrapper ERROR: /usr/bin/ssh.whonix-orig does not exist"in Whonix 8
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Install ssh.

sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install openssh-client

Read full topic
item.source: "uwt wrapper ERROR: /usr/bin/ssh.whonix-orig does not exist"in Whonix 8
